name: Third Wave Fashion
tag_list: fashion, fashion-2-0, startups, e-commerce, database, business
overview:
Third Wave Fashion is all about fashion tech startups.

They offer strategic planning and experienced hands-on consulting for fashion-focused web-based startups. They also work with brand and investors in finding the best fashion startups out there.

They are building a free, comprehensive, searchable database (launching at the beginning of 2013) where you’ll be able to search for information about all Third Wave Fashion companies, founders, and funders. It’s rich with both detailed and broad information and they’ll be sharing it all.

They host meetups in NY, LA, and SF as a way to engage their community and spread knowledge from successful entrepreneurs, VCs, marketing experts, and more.

On their blog, you can read all about the news happening in fashion tech and get inspired by their interviews both with people who are launching fashion startups and the players from the large fashion houses that are leading the technology revolution. You can also get advice about how to launch your own kick ass fashion startup.
